alert.note: Alert for Attala; Holmes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 21 at 8:00PM CDT until April 25 at 6:08PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River Near Bentonia affecting Madison and Yazoo Counties. Big Black River Near Bovina affecting Warren and Hinds Counties. Big Black River At West affecting Holmes and Attala Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River At West. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 19 feet, Thousands of acres of agricultural land are under water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 18.7 feet and slowly falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage by early Monday. - Flood stage is 15 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Big Black River West 15.0 18.7 Thu 6 pm CDT 18.0 17.2 15.6 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Friday morning.
